root.name: Logarithmic 2D viewer
root.description: 2D viewer allowing to view image data in logarithmic scale. Useful to observe high dynamic range images, e.g. Fourier spectra or 16-bits images.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2016-06-22 19:17:05
Fixed log canvas for Icy 1.8+
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2013-05-23 20:56:36
* Updated deprecated methods * Fixed issue when dealing with empty (null) image
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2011-12-21 14:33:36
